Text: Great job, guyz! All media works!
what do i do with it? i have portal 2 but i dunno what to do with this folder, someone help :L
what do i do wth this file?

@lookafishlol

The file in this torrent is a 7-zip archive. Open it with 7-zip on Windows. Inside the archive is an Adobe Air installer and a Flash file. Open the installer and it'll install Final Hours of Portal 2 like any other program.

Actually, scratch the last part. The .exe file won't install anything, it just runs the interactive ebook.

You will need the Adobe Air runtime installed though; it's in the support folder if you need it.

Thank you. Everything work fine except my AVG says that there is 2 harmful viruses in installation. 
 I ignored that and nothing happened. Confirm is this safe or/and false alarm by antivirus?
